SEARCH
Module com.example.loginpage
Package com.example.loginpage.module.books

Class Book

java.lang.Object
com.example.loginpage.module.books.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdventureBook, AllegoricalBook, Autobiography, DramaBook, FamilyBook, FictionBook
public abstract sealed class Book extends Object implements Serializable permits FictionBook, FamilyBook, DramaBook, Autobiography, AllegoricalBook, AdventureBook
An abstract base class for a book that provides a common structure and functionality for all book types. This class includes basic book metadata and support for serialisation.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book()
      Default constructor for creating a book object without initializing fields.

    • Book

      public Book(int id, String title, String author, int year, String genre, String description, String imageSrc, int votes)
      Constructs a new book with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the book.
      title - Title of the book.
      author - Author of the book.
      year - Publication year of the book.
      genre - Genre of the book.
      description - A brief description of the book.
      imageSrc - Image source URL for the book cover.
      votes - Number of votes or ratings the book has received.
